mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, user_pw, email_id, email_domain, join_date, admin, profile_image) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, now(),#{admin},#{profileImage})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_pw, email_id, email_domain, join_date, admin, profile_image from user order by join_date
